articles.author: Sylvie Corbet | AP
articles.title: Renovation chief: Notre Dame Cathedral is not saved yet
articles.description: The French general who is overseeing the reconstruction of the fire-devastated Notre Dame Cathedral says the Paris landmark is not saved yet
articles.content:
Notre Dame is not saved because ... there is an extremely important step ahead, which is to remove the scaffolding that had been built around the spire before the fire, he said.

articles.author: Niniek Karmini | AP
articles.title: Indonesia's flooded capital disinfected to fend off disease
articles.description: Soldiers and health workers have sprayed Indonesia's capital with disinfectant to fend off possible diseases spread by massive flooding that has killed 60 people and affected hundreds of thousands
articles.content:
Its the worst flooding in the area since 2007, when 80 people were killed over 10 days.
More than a thousand soldiers and health workers sprayed disinfectant in hard-hit areas on Sunday to anticipate possible diseases spread by flooding, such as dengue and l… [+3878 chars]

articles.author: Steven Goff
articles.title: Wayne Rooney didn’t miss a beat in England. What is D.C. United doing to replace him?
articles.description: Training camp opens in two weeks, and United has yet to add a player, much less a one near the level of its departed captain. That seems likely to change very soon.
articles.content:
Training camp opens in two weeks, and United has yet to add anyone, even a role player.
That seems likely to change very soon.

articles.author: Kevin Sieff
articles.title: Climate change is playing havoc with Mexico's monarch butterfly migration
articles.description: More than 95 percent of the species migrates each year to the same few hillsides in Central Mexico. Changing temperatures and weather are making their journey more precarious.
articles.content:
ROSARIO, Mexico No one knows when millions of monarch butterflies began crisscrossing North America, spending their winters clustered on the same hillsides in Central Mexico, a blaze of orange wings in the green forest.
